welcome_message: Hi {user_mention}! Welcome to the Polish Veggies & Fruits Bot!
products_title: Choose a product to add to your cart:
no_products_available: Sorry, no products available at the moment. Check back later!
product_selected_prompt: You selected: {product_name}. How many kg do you want? (e.g., 0.5, 1, 2.5)
invalid_quantity_prompt: Invalid quantity. Please enter a positive number (e.g., 0.5, 1, 2.5).
item_added_to_cart: {quantity} kg of {product_name} added to your cart.
what_next_prompt: What would you like to do next?
order_placed_success:
✅ Order Placed!
Your Order ID is: #{order_id}
Total: {total_price:.2f} EUR.
We will contact you regarding pickup/delivery details. Thank you!
order_placed_error: Sorry, there was an error placing your order. Please try again.
admin_unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this section.
admin_enter_product_name: Enter the name of the new product:
admin_enter_product_price: Product name: {product_name}. Now enter its price per kg (e.g., 2.99):
admin_invalid_price: Invalid price. Please enter a positive number (e.g., 2.99).
admin_product_add_failed: Failed to add product '{product_name}'. It might already exist.
admin_confirm_delete_prompt: ⚠️ Are you sure you want to delete {product_name}? This cannot be undone.
admin_shopping_list_empty: Shopping list is empty (no pending/confirmed orders with items).
